comment.body:
But a raven may speak human. :D
They can "speak". :)

@Geekless: 
My desktop PC also/too:
China 604 peers
United States 178 peers
Russia 47 peers

Australia 36 peers
Canada 36 peers
Netherlands 26 peers
Germany 21 peers

"LBRY is the winner of peer-to-peer video platforms, but it needs a little bit more polish."

LBRY is an interesting project. I slowly keep collecting LBC (LBRY Credits) mostly by watching videos on it. Do you know any similar platforms, for example for music/sounds? (With the exceptions of DSounds on the Steem blockchain)

@caryoscelus: This is not gaming. The LBC (LBRY Credits) rewards are coming automatically and intentionally. And I use LBRY naturally. I watch videos, in which I am interested in. I do not think that this would be "questionably good". You can earn 1-100 (random amount of) LBC (LBRY Credits) per day by doing this. This is called the "Daily Watch Reward", so this is intentionally built-in into LBRY.
